a_sch_office02_eve03:
A lot of the teachers here are real colorful
characters. I need to try harder to stand out.
a_sch_office02_ni01:
If it’s Mr. Jacq you’re after, you should try the
biology lab. That’s usually where you’ll find him.
a_sch_office02_ni05:
Director Clavell is an inspiration. He never talks
down to anyone even though he’s so important.\r
I hope I can be a great man like him someday.
